data.name: Keyboard fatfinger
data.description:
You are constantly fat-fingering your keyboard inputs, which is why you always miss your targeted key on your keyboard.

Your input is an array/list containing letters and invalid characters.


**Task:**

Correct the input letters given in the array by replacing the input letter with the following key on the keyboard from left to right.

The input list should be mutated and have invalid characters removed in the output list.


**Example:**
 
V, Z, F -> B, U, G                                                        
<, Q, A -> W, S 
                                                                                      
**Exceptions:**

The input letters P, L and M should be replaced by the closest letter on their left side:                           
P -> O                                 
L -> K                              
M -> N                           
                                                                                    
**Rules:**

- Keyboard Layout is QWERTZ
- All inputs are strings 
- All input letters are uppercase
